simulated_ratings.title: Hereditary (2018)
simulated_ratings.feeling: Slow-burn dread and family trauma spiral hit my sweet spot for atmospheric horror.

simulated_ratings.feeling: Loud fantasy-action about immortal witch hunting isn’t my thing and leaves me cold.

simulated_ratings.title: The Wailing (2016)
simulated_ratings.feeling: Brooding small-town mystery and creeping folklore dread felt rich and unsettling.

simulated_ratings.title: The Babadook (2014)
simulated_ratings.feeling: Psychological grief-horror with mounting unease really works for me.

simulated_ratings.title: The Descent (2005)
simulated_ratings.feeling: Claustrophobic terror and group unraveling kept me tense throughout.

simulated_ratings.title: The Invitation (2015)
simulated_ratings.feeling: Well-executed grappling, but competition-doc stakes don’t grab me.

simulated_ratings.title: The Autopsy of Jane Doe (2016)
simulated_ratings.feeling: Contained occult mystery with escalating dread is exactly my lane.

simulated_ratings.title: The Orphanage (2007)
simulated_ratings.feeling: Melancholic ghost story with a strong emotional core lands nicely.

simulated_ratings.title: Sinister (2012)
simulated_ratings.feeling: Creepy home movies and slow-burn setup work even if some beats feel familiar.

simulated_ratings.title: Talk to Me (2023)
simulated_ratings.feeling: Sharp concept and nasty consequences make for a solid modern scare ride.

simulated_ratings.title: Barbarian (2022)
simulated_ratings.feeling: Unpredictable structure and tension swings kept me hooked.

simulated_ratings.title: Rosemary's Baby (1968)
simulated_ratings.feeling: Paranoid slow-burn and domestic dread build beautifully.

simulated_ratings.title: Halloween (1978)
simulated_ratings.feeling: Lean, moody slasher craft I respect more than I love.

simulated_ratings.title: Se7en (1995)
simulated_ratings.feeling: Grim procedural with strong mood, a notch below my top thrillers.

simulated_ratings.title: Nightcrawler (2014)
simulated_ratings.feeling: Dark character study with razor-edged tension really clicks for me.

simulated_ratings.title: Wind River (2017)

simulated_ratings.title: Memories of Murder (2003)
simulated_ratings.feeling: Haunting, ambiguous investigation with tone I gravitate toward.

simulated_ratings.title: The Chaser (2008)

simulated_ratings.title: Mother (2009)
simulated_ratings.feeling: Off-kilter crime drama with unsettling turns holds my interest.

simulated_ratings.title: Burning (2018)

simulated_ratings.title: The Prestige (2006)
simulated_ratings.feeling: Obsessive rivalry and twisty plotting are very much my flavor.

simulated_ratings.feeling: Eerie, cerebral sci-fi horror with images that stick.

simulated_ratings.feeling: Methodical occult ritual and escalating dread are exactly my lane
